title: How to Permanently Disable Airplane Mode on Windows 10

steps.title: Type cmd into the box that comes up.
steps.content: Type cmd into the box that comes up. Do not click OK.

steps.title: Press Ctrl+⇧ Shift+↵ Enter at the same time.
steps.content: Press Ctrl + ⇧ Shift + ↵ Enter at the same time.

steps.title: Click Yes on the UAC dialog that comes up.
steps.content: Click Yes on the UAC dialog that comes up. If you do not have administrator permissions, then you cannot do this.

steps.title: Type the following command inside of the Command Prompt window:
steps.content: Type the following command inside of the Command Prompt window: SC CONFIG RmSvc START= DISABLED

steps.title: Press ↵ Enter.
steps.content: Press ↵ Enter . The command prompt should then report that it was successful.

steps.title: Restart your computer.
steps.content: Restart your computer. Click Start , Power , and then "Restart". This will apply the changes.
